Weapon[1].name: Short sword
Weapon[1].description:
Short iron sword. Blade is a bit worn out, but the sword
itself is easy and quick to handle.
Weapon[2].name: Meat cleaver
Weapon[2].description:
It's not especially sharp, but lesser foes might be
intimidated by its dried blood stains crude design.
Weapon[3].name: Iron mace
Weapon[3].description:
Rusty iron mace with hefty weight. Can cause momentary
stun to enemies.
Weapon[4].name: Crude sword
Weapon[4].description:
A crude bladed weapon. Strong weapon that requires 2
hands to use properly.
Weapon[5].name: Claymore
Weapon[5].description:
A heavy 2-handed sword. Creates devastating damage to
all living.
Weapon[6].name: Dagger
Weapon[6].description: A simple dagger for children to practice sword fighting.
Weapon[7].name: Long sword
Weapon[7].description: A long iron sword. The balance of the blade feels good.
Weapon[8].name: Eastern sword
Weapon[8].description:
A delicate sword from far-east. It is very sharp, but
fragile. Its shape is prone to critical attacks.
Weapon[10].name: Iron spear
Weapon[10].description: A standard military spear. Requires 2 hands to use.
Weapon[11].name: Short bow
Weapon[11].description:
A short compact bow. Requires 2 hands to use. If you have
iron arrows, you can shoot with [SHIFT].
Weapon[13].name: Cursed short sword
Weapon[13].description: Short iron sword. Blade is a bit worn out.
Weapon[14].name: Cursed meat cleaver
Weapon[14].description:
It's not especially sharp, but lesser foes might be
intimidated by its dried blood stains and crude design.
Weapon[15].name: Cursed iron mace
Weapon[15].description:
Rusty iron mace with hefty weight. Can cause momentary
stun to enemies.
Weapon[16].name: Sergal spear
Weapon[16].description:
A heavy throwing spear used by the sergal tribes in
the northern parts of the western world.
Weapon[17].name: Cursed claymore
Weapon[17].description:
A heavy 2-handed sword. Creates devastating damage to
all living.
Weapon[18].name: Cursed dagger
Weapon[18].description: A simple dagger for children to practice sword fighting.
Weapon[19].name: Cursed long sword
Weapon[19].description: A long iron sword. The balance of the blade feels good.
Weapon[20].name: Miasma
Weapon[20].description:
An otherwordly sword that oozes toxic gasses. The sword
is said to house the strength of six men.
Weapon[22].name: Cursed iron spear
Weapon[22].description: A standard military spear. Requires 2 hands to use.
Weapon[23].name: Cursed short bow
Weapon[23].description:
A short compact bow. Requires 2 hands to use. If you have
iron arrows, you can shoot with [SHIFT].
Weapon[24].name: Skeletal arm
Weapon[24].description:
A skeletal arm that has been cut off. It seems somewhat
sharp and could be used as a weapon.
Weapon[26].name: Cursed meat cleaver
Weapon[26].description:
It's not especially sharp, but lesser foes might
be intimidated by it's dried blood stains.
Weapon[27].name: weapon1
Weapon[28].name: weapon2_girl
Weapon[30].name: Saw cleaver
Weapon[32].name: Shark teeth
Weapon[32].description:
A crude makeshift saw blade. The razor edge of the blade
easily shreds soft skin.
Weapon[33].name: Cursed shark teeth
Weapon[33].description:
A crude makeshift saw blade. The razor edge of the blade
easily shreds soft skin.
Weapon[34].name: Bone shears
Weapon[34].description:
Rusty scissors that are a little hard to use but can cause
massive damage. Requires 2 hands to use.
Weapon[35].name: Cursed bone shears
Weapon[35].description:
Rusty scissors that are a little hard to use but can cause
massive damage. Requires 2 hands to use.
Weapon[36].name: War scythe
Weapon[36].description:
A large spear with a broad curved blade. Ideal for multiple
opponents and targets. Requires 2 hands to use.
Weapon[37].name: Cursed war scythe
Weapon[37].description:
A large spear with a broad curved blade. Ideal for multiple
opponents and targets. Requires 2 hands to use.
Weapon[38].name: Morning star
Weapon[38].description:
A morning star with hefty weight. Can cause momentary
stun to enemies as well as bleeding.
Weapon[39].name: Cursed morning star
Weapon[39].description:
A morning star with hefty weight. Can cause momentary
stun to enemies as well as bleeding.
Weapon[40].name: Ritual spear
Weapon[40].description:
A simple spear used by the primitive tribes living underground.
The tip is coated in poison. Requires 2 hands to use.
Weapon[41].name: Cursed ritual spear
Weapon[41].description:
A simple spear used by the primitive tribes living underground.
The tip is coated in poison. Requires 2 hands to use.
Weapon[42].name: Purified eastern sword
Weapon[42].description:
A delicate sword from far-east. It is very sharp, but
fragile. Its shape is prone to critical attacks.
Weapon[44].name: Scimitar
Weapon[44].description:
A sword with a curved blade. Typically used around Eastern
Sanctuaries. The blade causes deep slashing wounds.
Weapon[45].name: Axe
Weapon[45].description:
A typical hand axe used for multiple purposes. One of
those purposes is dismemberment.
Weapon[46].name: Cursed scimitar
Weapon[46].description:
A sword with a curved blade. Typically used around Eastern
Sanctuaries. The blade causes deep slashing wounds.
Weapon[47].name: Cursed axe
Weapon[47].description:
A typical hand axe used for multiple purposes. One of
those purposes is dismemberment.
Weapon[49].name: Blue Sin
Weapon[49].description:
A fine and light one-handed sword with faint blue carvings.
On the hilt there is some writing: "For the sinners."
Weapon[50].name: Cursed Blue Sin
Weapon[50].description:
A fine and light one-handed sword with faint blue carvings.
On the hilt there is some writing: "For the sinners."
